channel.title: Vote4Cash Help
channel.description: Hi im wanting to make a vote4cash system and i cant find any tutorials that are for .html there all for .php. Can someone please help me?

item.title: Vote4Cash Help
item.dc:creator: @DannyBoy1995 DannyBoy1995
item.description:
@DannyBoy1995 wrote:

I Vain I:

Use 000webhost.com or install PHP.

Could you show me how to use 000webhost.com? because im on the page and i registered on it and i cant figure out like how to make the .php page for vote4cash.

Read full topic

item.title: Vote4Cash Help
item.dc:creator: @dfmotty dfmotty
item.description:
@dfmotty wrote:

Search button & Google & Ask & Bing.
Tutorials are EVERYWHERE for vote4cash. There are so many tutorials because people use vote4cash for other things besides runescape servers, like wow servers and stuff.

item.title: Vote4Cash Help
item.dc:creator: @DannyBoy1995 DannyBoy1995
item.description:
@DannyBoy1995 wrote:

I Vain I:

No, you just need a web host that supports PHP, or you can install PHP and use your computer like a webhost, so people can connect to the PHP scripts on your computer.

well im currently using a free webhost called webs and i dont know if it supports .php. would you be able to install php on my computer and help me with it? like tv me

Read full topic

item.title: Vote4Cash Help
item.dc:creator: @DannyBoy1995 DannyBoy1995
item.description:
@DannyBoy1995 wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:2, topic:389897”][quote author=DannyBoy1995 link=topic=485805.msg3559727#msg3559727 date=1302162768]
Hi im wanting to make a vote4cash system and i cant find any tutorials that are for .html there all for .php. Can someone please help me?
[/quote]

You won’t find any. HTML’s sole purpose is to tell the browser how to display the information. PHP is for handling events on the server side. Like connecting to servers, reading/writing files, generating CAPTCHA images, etc.[/quote]
So in order for me to get vote4cash i need to pay for a .php site like vbulletin or smf?

Read full topic

item.title: Vote4Cash Help
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

DannyBoy1995:

Hi im wanting to make a vote4cash system and i cant find any tutorials that are for .html there all for .php. Can someone please help me?

You won’t find any. HTML’s sole purpose is to tell the browser how to display the information. PHP is for handling events on the server side. Like connecting to servers, reading/writing files, generating CAPTCHA images, etc.

Read full topic
